meta.title: Alex Beuscher - Digital Marketing & Web Consulting
meta.author: Alex Beuscher
meta.description: Alex Beuscher is a web developer and entrepreneur living in Amherst, MA. He has most recently worked as a web developer in California and is seeking opportunities primarily in the non-profit sector.
meta.keywords: front end developer, web development amherst

multimedia.intro: I have been involved in film and audio production for about 15 years. My initial foray into the field was as a line producer on an independent film. I worked as a DJ and MC for 10 years following, hosting pub trivia as well as weddings and other events.
multimedia.experience: When I moved into radio, I worked as a content producer and video production comprised about 50% of my time. I had a small team whom I coordinated to film interviews, live events, concerts, and in studio sketches. Since then I have been employed on and off as a voiceover artist in multiple scenarios. I am specifically skilled at production, voiceover, and web integration, but I also can edit, film, and engineer audio at an amateur level.

skills.items: JavaScript, PHP, HTML/CSS, React, Vue.js, Node.js, GraphQL, GROQ
11ty, Gatsby, WordPress, Sanity.io, Contentstack, Git, AWS Services, Figma
OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Mistral APIs, Multi-LLM application architecture, Prompt optimization

caseStudies.title: Medical AI Assistant (MAIA) - HIE of One
caseStudies.description: Built a patient-controlled medical AI assistant demonstrating secure health data integration with multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Mistral, Together). Implemented GNAP protocol for secure authorization between patient EHR systems and AI services. Application serves as proof-of-concept for healthcare providers considering open source alternatives to traditional EHR systems while maintaining HIPAA compliance and patient data sovereignty.

caseStudies.title: Technical Leadership - Contentstack
caseStudies.description: Managed junior development team across time zones while overhauling development processes. Implemented pair programming, established best practices, and provided context through regular stakeholder communication. Created leaner codebase and more autonomous, confident developers.

caseStudies.title: Enterprise Content Strategy - 2K Games
caseStudies.description: Led transition from agency-dependent web properties to unified in-house CMS. Implemented headless architecture supporting global localization needs across multiple game franchises. System became departmental standard and continues as foundation for company web presence.

employment.title: Senior Web Developer
employment.description: Managed contractors and stakeholders for marketing site built on Eleventy/Sanity.io stack. Assisted with GDPR/CCPA compliance implementation.

employment.title: Senior Web Developer & Team Lead
employment.description: Led remote team in Mumbai developing marketing sites using company's headless CMS with Gatsby. Provided voice-over work and technical documentation.

employment.title: Senior Web Developer
employment.description: Remote position managing WordPress, ZenDesk, and Marketo implementations. Collaborated with security team on compliance initiatives.

employment.title: Senior Web Developer
employment.description: Full-stack development for game title sites and web properties. Focus on security, localization, and compliance with GDPR/CCPA requirements.

employment.title: Online Content Director
employment.description: Managed content production team creating video, web, and mobile content. Supported sales department with branded web promotions.
